name: vanilla-flat-white
description: a collection of microprojects in HTML, CSS, and Vanilla JS

scripts.build: rm -rf dist/ && tsc build.ts && node build.js
scripts.deploy-reference: git add out/ && git commit -m "Deploy to gh-pages" && git subtree push --prefix out origin gh-pages
scripts.deploy: npm run build && git add dist/ && git commit -m "Deploy to gh-pages" && git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages

author: John Vandivier
